title: Runtime error in OpenBSD
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
$ go test -v
runtime: split stack overflow: 0x20a55fe38 < 0x20a560000
throw: runtime: split stack overflow

goroutine 1 [chan receive]:
main.(*builder).do(0xf84010bd80, 0xf84012e840, 0xf840103c00, 0x1)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:611 +0x3e7
main.runTest(0x85f328, 0xf840084350, 0x100000001, 0xf840102cc0)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/test.go:367 +0x1b28
main.main()
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/main.go:141 +0x426

goroutine 2 [syscall]:
created by runtime.main
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:221

goroutine 3 [runnable]:
syscall.Syscall6()
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/syscall/asm_openbsd_amd64.s:57 +0x61
syscall.wait4(0x36e, 0xf840097420, 0x0, 0xf840181bd0, 0x1, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/syscall/zsyscall_openbsd_amd64.go:32 +0x81
syscall.Wait4(0x36e, 0x20a560474, 0x0, 0xf840181bd0, 0x474f6a, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/syscall/syscall_bsd.go:136 +0x6a
os.(*Process).wait(0xf840212aa0, 0xf840097940, 0x0, 0x0, 0x47520c, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/os/exec_unix.go:22 +0xe1
os.(*Process).Wait(0xf840212aa0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x20a560548)
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/os/doc.go:43 +0x25
os/exec.(*Cmd).Wait(0xf8401a8100, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/os/exec/exec.go:302 +0x1b7
os/exec.(*Cmd).Run(0xf8401a8100, 0x653788, 0xf84010bb40, 0xf84017b060)
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/os/exec/exec.go:226 +0x6d
main.(*builder).runOut(0xf84010bd80, 0xf840119ae0, 0x29, 0xf8401196d1, 0x200000018, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:1066 +0x19e
main.(*builder).run(0xf84010bd80, 0xf840119ae0, 0x29, 0xf8401196d1, 0x18, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:1031 +0x8d
main.gcToolchain.gc(0xf84010bd80, 0xf840210e00, 0xf8401c7d40, 0xf800000036,
0xf840212e40, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:1251 +0x815
main.gcToolchain.gcÂ·i(0x636700000002, 0xf84010bd80, 0xf840210e00, 0xf8401c7d40,
0x1000000036, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:0 +0xce
main.(*builder).build(0xf84010bd80, 0xf8400df0b0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x5badd0, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:688 +0x938
main._func_004(0xf8400979f8, 0xf840097a00, 0xf840097a38, 0x42fa12, 0xf8400df0b0, ...)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:557 +0x2f0
main._func_005(0xf8400979f8, 0xf8400978e8, 0x0, 0x0)
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:606 +0xb4
created by main.(*builder).do
        /home/neo/go/src/cmd/go/build.go:608 +0x3b6

goroutine 4 [runnable]:
os/exec._func_004(0xf840097908, 0xf84025da40, 0x0, 0x0)
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/os/exec/exec.go:269
created by os/exec.(*Cmd).Start
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/os/exec/exec.go:269 +0x65c
panic: runtime error: call of nil func value
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x0 pc=0x0]

goroutine 2 [syscall]:
created by runtime.main
        /home/neo/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:221




Which operating system are you using?
OpenBSD 5.1, amd64

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go 1.0.2
